Text: Fuck islam fascism and the scums dream of a world domination caliphate. Europeans have no debt to the yemenite nomad, the warlord Mohammed or any relatives to the somali motherfucker, Rageh Omaar.

MacTheRipper: "Fuck islam fascism and the scums dream of a world domination caliphate."

You seem a bit delutional. That's never gonna happen. But if denying the past helps you, good luck with that. Neo-nazis also deny the holocaust, but that doesn't change the facts.

islam is the dictatorship of faith--like nazism and other dictatorships--everybody knows that muhammud was a warlord and killed  his own hands his prisonners  and he got married to a 6 years old called aisha and raped her when she was 9 these are facts--so dont try to rewrite history---if the muslims stayed in mecca and whent around that black stone of theirs and not tyrranize judea where the xtians and jews where there long long before the crazy hordes of alla came along no-one invited them to judea and now the muslims are paying the price --blame your forefathers or dump this vile dogma you call islam..........
The real threat to peace and civilisation comes from the people who sympathise and actually promote the causes of islam. They are the first who should be guillotined.

Islam being a true faith fills fear in the hearts of the perverted. only a peaceful person can understand the message. keep on crying...islam is this ...islam is that....lemme ask u sumthing...why r u so scared ...????   if your faith in whatever u believe in is so strong...why r u so scared?

It's so sad to see such ignorance and scum on Piratebay.

When faced with a voice of moderation and evidence to bust a few myths they simply get aggressive.

I feel really sad that these simple souls have been so badly lead astray by a few malicious people who realise by making scapegoats out of a race or religion they can further their own interests - wake up and smell the coffeee - you are being duped!

I hope that piratebay can remove these ugly personalities as they are a stain on a site that has something to say about freedom and tolerance
the quality of the torrent is excellent. and the material presented in it is unbiased.
